mapper.select:
select siol.* from stock_in_order_level2 siol left join stock_level2_info sli on siol.warehouse_code = sli.warehouse_code and sli.del_flag = 0
and siol.del_flag = 0
and siol.order_code like concat(concat('%',#{condition.orderCode}),'%')
and sli.warehouse_name like concat(concat('%',#{condition.warehouseName}),'%')
and Date(siol.entry_time) >= #{condition.entryTimeBegin} and Date(siol.entry_time) <= #{condition.entryTimeEnd}
order by siol.create_time desc
